title: Chain Snatching Case in Delhi Metro
description: A man is accused of snatching a woman’s gold chain in a crowded metro train. Eyewitnesses are uncertain, and CCTV footage is inconclusive.

title: Hit and Run Case
description: A car allegedly hits a pedestrian and flees the scene. The accused claims it was a medical emergency and unintentional.

title: Cyberbullying Incident
description: A teenager is accused of harassing a classmate online. The defense claims the account was hacked.

title: ATM Card Fraud
description: A man is caught on CCTV using someone else’s ATM card to withdraw money. He claims the card was given voluntarily.

title: College Fight Turns Criminal
description: An argument between two college students turns violent. Both sides claim self-defense and allege the other started it.

title: Property Boundary Dispute Between Neighbors
description: A wall construction leads to a property line dispute between two families in the same locality.

title: Rent Not Paid for 6 Months
description: A landlord sues a tenant who hasn’t paid rent for 6 months and refuses to vacate the property.

title: Construction Delay by Real Estate Builder
description: A buyer files a civil case as their flat possession has been delayed for over 2 years despite full payment.

title: Breach of Marriage Contract
description: A family backs out of a wedding after accepting money and gifts as dowry. The bride’s family files a case.

title: Hotel Overbooking Compensation Case
description: A luxury hotel canceled a confirmed booking citing overbooking, ruining a honeymoon plan. The couple sues for damages.

title: Freedom of Speech vs Hate Speech
description: A politician's social media post is taken down for violating hate speech policies. He challenges the action under Article 19(1)(a).

title: Right to Privacy Violation
description: A telecom company is accused of leaking customer data to advertisers. A PIL is filed under the right to privacy.

title: Ban on Public Gatherings
description: A district administration bans public gatherings citing security threats. Citizens challenge the ban under Article 19.

title: Reservation in Promotions
description: A general category government employee sues after being denied promotion due to reservation policy. Is it justified under the Constitution?

title: Dress Code vs Right to Religion
description: A student suspended for wearing religious attire challenges the school’s dress code policy as unconstitutional.

title: Dowry Harassment Case
description: A newly married woman files a complaint under Section 498A of the IPC against her husband and in-laws for mental and physical abuse.

title: Section 302 Murder Allegation
description: A man is accused of murdering his wife. He claims she committed suicide, while the family alleges dowry pressure.

title: Section 375 – Rape Under False Promise
description: A woman accuses a colleague of rape under the pretense of marriage. He claims the relationship was consensual.

title: Section 420 – Cheating in Business
description: A shopkeeper is accused of taking advance payment from multiple customers and not delivering the goods.

title: Section 326 – Acid Attack Attempt
description: A man is arrested for allegedly attempting to throw acid on a girl after she rejected his proposal.
